name: Death Tracker
description: Tracks your deaths at every percentage

session-length.name: Session Length
session-length.description:
Allows a session to continue if entering a level before this duration (in seconds) has passed since exiting the level.

<cy>A value of -2</c> means the session will end when you exit the level (default).

<co>A value of -1</c> means the session will end when you exit the game.

pause-menu.name: Pause Menu Button
pause-menu.description: Adds the tracker button to the pause menu.

late-save.name: Late Save
late-save.description: Will save your deaths when exiting the level instead of when you die, this may fix lag spikes that happen on death.

safe-mode.name: Safe Mode
safe-mode.description: will not track runs if you are in noclip or speedhack (compatable with QOLMod and prism menu)

disable-tracking-completed-levels.name: Disable Tracking Completed Levels
disable-tracking-completed-levels.description: Disables tracking on completed online levels.

practice-zero-deaths.name: Enable 0% Practice Mode Deaths
practice-zero-deaths.description: Deaths will be shown instead of runs from 0% in practice mode.
